oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jones Chapel Church of Christ and Cemetery: family plot
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jones Chapel Church of Christ and Cemetery
Hwy 22, North of Tiptonville, Lake County, TN
Color photograph of several family plots enclosed by metal fences. In the foreground is the grave of Will Bushears.

The cemetery is the resting place for the mass burial of 75 Confederates from the Island No. 10 battle of early 1862. Many markers are associated with settlement history in the region when this area was known as Madrid's Bend. The oldest identified marker dates to 1838. Also notable are the number of cast-iron fences marking family plots.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cemeteries -- Tennessee
Cemeteries; Tombs & sepulchral monuments
